directions: Combine cabbage, bell pepper, cilantro, and jalapeño in large bowl; toss to blend. Whisk oil, lime juice, and cumin in small bowl to blend. Pour dressing over cabbage mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Toss before serving.)
ingredients: 4 cups thinly sliced green cabbage (from about 1/2 large head)
title: South-of-the-Border Coleslaw with Cilantro and Jalapeño
